thread.title: Immigrant Rapes 14-Year-Old Girl, What Happens Next Will STUN You…
thread.title_full: Immigrant Rapes 14-Year-Old Girl, What Happens Next Will STUN You…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Immigrant Rapes 14-Year-Old Girl, What Happens Next Will STUN You…
text:
It is no secret that our immigration system is a mess. 
Recently, we learned that a 14-year-old girl in Maryland was allegedly raped by an illegal immigrant in a high school bathroom. 
Now, we are learning of another horrendous crime allegedly carried out by a Guatemalan national. 
Turns out the judge just cut him loose with a low bond. 
The great John Binder has the details on what happened next… 
From Breitbart : 
A Guatemalan national accused of raping a minor has disappeared after being allowed to post bail. 
Gabino Vargas-Perez, a 20-year-old legal resident whose parents live in Guatemala, allegedly raped a 14-year-old girl whom he was dating after stalking her for months at Central High School, according to KETV News. 
The victim’s aunt told KETV that the teen reported the stalking to school officials but nothing was done. The administration says they have no records of the reports. 
Democrats are happy with this status quo? 
Apparently, this isn’t the first time this judge has done this. 
Nebraska Judge Jeffrey Marcuzzo, who set Vargas-Perez’s bail at only $5,000, has a history of setting low bonds for illegal immigrants accused of heinous crimes. 
How many innocent people need to be victimized by immigrants both legal and illegal before we finally recognize and address the huge holes in our immigration system? 
Illegal aliens commit a disproportionate amount of crime in this country. There’s no way around that. 
While we have seen studies that show legal immigrants commit less crime than U.S. born citizens, that doesn’t really address the fact that a lot of crime is being committed that is preventable. 
Also, there is no excuse for letting anyone, immigrant or not, out of jail that easily for such a serious crime. 
For some reason, I don’t think they are letting American citizens off the hook so easily over there in Omaha. 
Looks like this guy is gone and that poor young girl will never see justice carried out. 
Shameful.
